sentence.Network_en: He has been disburdened of his responsibility as chairman.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已被解除主席的职责.

sentence.Network_en: The dockers disburdened the merchandise at the dock.
sentence.Network_cn: 码头工人把货物卸在码头上.

RelatedPhrase.word: To disburden a person of his load

list.key: To disburden a person of his load
list.abs: To disburden a person of his load ., 使释重负.
disburden one's mind of doubt打消疑虑
We disburdened him of some of his anxieties ., 我们解除了他的一些忧虑.
We tried to disburden him of his trouble ., 我们试图解除他的烦恼.

auth_sentence.content: To be defeated, she realised, is also to be disburdened.
auth_sentence.res_content: To be defeated, she realised, is also to be disburdened.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To be defeated, she realised, is also to be disburdened.
